definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_completes_advancement</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="entity_has_achievement"><field name="achievement">end/kill_dragon</field><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_add_item"><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="item"><block type="mcitem_all"><field name="value">CUSTOM:StrengthSword</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value><next><block type="entity_execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/tellraw @a {"text":"The StrengthSword has been obtained!","bold":true,"color":"red"}</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"></block></value></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></xml>
